channel.title: Urban Shadows 2e: Human Trials
channel.description:
Checking out Urban Shadows 2e! A seat is being held for Fraser Simons, so three players total (and me MCing).
![urban-fantasy-featured-image|690x315](upload://qAuE8TPLvlHQeErdZ5S7wr6j1IT.jpeg) *A grisly scene has been found in one of the biology labs of the University, but no one can figure it out: a leyline correction? A sacrificial ritual? Just a plain, old murder? While the mundane world hasn't quite heard about it yet, the supernatural world is scrambling to point fingers and return to the fragile truces they had--but it's different now. In the middle of winter no less, something has to be done.*
**Content Warnings:** Physical violence, social manipulation, werewolves (body transformations), vampires (consent, blood) **System:** [Urban Shadows 2e quickstart](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/333500/Urban-Shadows-2nd-Ed-Quickstart?affiliate_id=1113880) **Breaks:** Two ten minute breaks after one and two hours. **Tools:** [Role](https://playrole.com/) **Recording:** I would like to record the sessions, but will only do so with everyone's explicit consent (which can be withdrawn later). **Safety:** This game adheres to the [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). [Lines & Veils](https://rpg.stackexchange.com/questions/30906/what-do-the-terms-lines-and-veils-mean) and [Script Change](https://briebeau.com/thoughty/script-change/) will be in use, along with an open door policy.
**Sessions** [date=2021-01-04 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNjuSgiWtycpMeuY-Zk [date=2021-01-11 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNjuZ9SWQeffVDrx2DX [date=2021-01-18 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNjudOV0It-KYr9YCMq [date=2021-01-25 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNjujpjGFMJRDt7SstD
